modules.description: Generates templated strings by interpolating values from basic types like integers, strings, and options using a custom syntax. Processes raw string literals to embed expressions at compile time, enabling safe and efficient template construction. Used to generate SQL queries, configuration files, and dynamic HTTP responses with minimal runtime overhead.

The module provides functions for building and manipulating text templates through operations like inserting literals (strings, numbers, booleans), adding punctuation, and applying formatting (quotes, indentation). It works with template types (`t`), compiled templates (`compiled`), and buffers, enabling tasks such as structured string generation, code output, or report formatting. Specific use cases include dynamically constructing SQL queries, generating configuration files, or assembling formatted logs with customizable separators and nesting.
